abstract: The energy giant pushed back the deadline for its $1.7 billion takeover offer for Cove Energy, an oil and gas exploration company, to June 27.
snippet: The energy giant pushed back the deadline for its $1.7 billion takeover offer for Cove Energy, an oil and gas exploration company, to June 27.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – The energy giant Royal Dutch Shell extended the deadline on Thursday for its £1.12 billion offer, or $1.74 billion, to acquire the oil and gas exploration company Cove Energy.

headline.main: Shell Extends Deadline for Cove Energy Bid
